details.description: No need to choose between Bushwick and BedStuy with this one! Live right on that line and enjoy one of the quickest growing and most popular neighborhoods today. With all the conveniences of and Broadway right outside and Myrtle Avenue just down the street, you'll have everything you need nearby. Quickly walk to a HUGE grocer (such a luxury in Brooklyn), bars and restaurants galore, and the easiest transportation ever! Conveniently located off the J and M trains as well as the B15, B38, B46, B47, and B54 bus routes. FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Excellent Natural Light! Shared Laundry Room Shared Roof Deck Bike Storage Parking (by availability) Pet Friendly for only $50/month!!

amenities.other: Hardwood Floors, Roof Access, Shared Outdoor Space

details.description:
Amazing 3 Bed 3 Bath in a Prime Bushwick location! Spacious apartment with a layout tailored perfectly for shared living Located by Maria Hernandez Park, just steps away from the L train (same block) No broker fee!
-3 Queen sized bedrooms +3 Full bathrooms -Rooftop deck + Shared backyard -Laundry in building -Dishwasher -Central Air ? AC/Heat -Ample closet space -Window to every room -Bike room -Lounge/co-working common-space
Take advantage of the rooftop deck and shared backyard, perfect for soaking up the sun or hosting gatherings with friends. Benefit from convenient amenities such as laundry facilities in the building, a dishwasher for easy cleanup, and central air conditioning/heating for year-round comfort. Additional Perks: Store your bike hassle-free in the dedicated bike room, and utilize the rec room for additional space for work or relaxation.
Experience the vibrant charm of Bushwick with its renowned street art scene, eclectic boutiques, and cafes. Explore Bushwick?s diverse culinary scene and discover the neighborhood?s nightlife with a variety of restaurants, bars, breweries, and music venues. Enjoy Maria Hernandez Park for outdoor activities and community events.
Just two blocks away, you?ll find a supermarket to fulfill all your grocery needs and a ton of other stores nearby. Super easy commute to Manhattan ? Union Square in only 20 minutes door to door!

This Ridgewood neighborhood backs right up to Bushwick, serving as it's older and wiser sibling :) You can enjoy all of the same delicious cuisine, fair trade hot (and necessary) coffee, unique locally owned businesses, bodegas and grocers, and centralized transportation as it's neighboring Brooklyn areas, all while keeping that lovely community feel of a slightly more residential and peaceful existence. *Long exhale* now that's the right choice. Conveniently located off the L train and the B13, B38, B57 bus routes.
FEATURES: Hardwood Floor Stainless Steel Kitchen Dishwasher Central A/C and Heat Shared Laundry Room Pet Friendly First; Security NO FEE

Beautiful 3 beds/4 bath duplex with exposed brick, ample closet space and great light. Apartment features exposed brick, beautifully tiled bathrooms, dishwasher, microwave, Central A/C, hardwood floors, views on Manhattan from the windows. Location is prime Bushwick, steps to the Central Ave (M), and just a few blocks from the L at Morgan or Jefferson, and not far from Myrtle Wyckoff JMZ.

details.description:
An unbeatable location right between Williamsburg and Greenpoint! You won't even have enough days in a year to visit all of the restaurants, coffee shops, bars, art and music venues, locally owned businesses, thrift shops, bike shops, and the list goes on and on!! This building offers you the chance to be a short walk to the Lorimer/Metropolitan area of East Williamsburg, the Bedford/Waterfront area of Williamsburg, AND the McCarren Park/Manhattan Ave area of Greenpoint. Oh, to have such opportunity!
Conveniently located off the L and G trains as well as the B24 and B48 bus routes.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors High Ceilings Stainless Steel Kitchen Dishwasher and Microwave Central A/C and Heat Excellent light from many windows
BUILDING FEATURES: Laundry Room Finished Roof Deck Virtual Doorman
First; Security NO FEE

PRIME Bushwick location right by Maria Hernandez Park! Right outside your door, you can find an actual full size grocer (I know, right?), countless bodegas, coffee shops, bars, restaurants, locally owned businesses, thrift and antique shops, music and dance venues? the list goes on and on! You?ll never find yourself bored around here and for those days where you don?t feel like being out, you?ll have a pretty sweet building to stay in as well. Conveniently located off the L and M trains, as well as the B38, B57, and B60 bus lines.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Dishwasher and Microwave Central A/C and Heat Private Balcony Shared Backyard Laundry Room
Pet Friendly! First; Security NO FEE

Do not miss out on this 3 bed / 1 bath apartment in Brooklyn's up and coming neighborhood Prospect Lefferts Gardens! People forget that Brooklyn is the biggest borough and offers some of the best, historic architecture. Enjoy the neighborhood's easy access to the B,Q,2,3 lines, a number of bus lines, and short walk to Prospect Park. Live within steps to juice bars, grocery stores, restaurants, coffee shops, bars, pharmacies, banks, local bakeries, and more to explore. Brooklyn Greenery, MIdwood Flats, Irv's, Bluebird, Blessings, and Food Sermon are just a couple of the many options to check out in this vibrant neighborhood.Easy commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.
